Package ch.bt.emm.dpVolumeHiding

Class DifferentiallyPrivateVolumeHidingEMM

java.lang.Object
ch.bt.emm.dpVolumeHiding.DifferentiallyPrivateVolumeHidingEMM
All Implemented Interfaces:
TwoRoundEMM
public class DifferentiallyPrivateVolumeHidingEMM extends Object implements TwoRoundEMM
This class implements the Differentially Private Volume Hiding SSE scheme from Patel et al.
Author:
Janet Greutmann
